main event: On February 27, 1961, two observers sighted a white object approximately 20 inches in diameter that appeared and disappeared at 60-second intervals, moving in a northward direction.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes,The observers thought the object was a meteor located 3 to 4 billion miles away,The object was observed at a 60-degree angle above the northern horizon,Both witnesses were civilians,No weather balloons were launched during the period of the sighting.
